column2: Heirloom of the Gemma\nfamily. Shines with a\npale and frigid light.
column3: 洁玛家代代相传下来的除魔的\n护符。散发着凛冽的苍白光辉，\n淡淡的寒气附着其上。

column2: A ruby set in gold.\nIts condition is\nvirtually flawless.
column3: 带有黄金装饰的大颗红宝石。\n保存状态良好，宝石的表面\n看不到明显的划痕。

column2: Sapphire-encrusted\nring inscribed with a\nmessage from its giver.
column3: 镶着蓝色宝石的戒指。\n内侧刻有赠送者的信息。

column2: Gold necklace adorned\nwith countless small\nrubies and patterns.
column3: 黄金项链。镶嵌着许多\n小颗的红宝石。上面有\n凌乱的刮痕。

column2: Beautiful golden vase.\nHas a hole for some\nvariety of ornament.
column3: 纯金打造的豪华台座。\n凹陷处可用来放置球体，\n目前用途不明。

column2: Medicine made from the\nRed Digitalis plant.\nHeals mind and body.
column3: 用红色毛地黄叶熬制的\n深红色药水。具有迅速\n恢复身心不适的功效。

column2: Magic wing. Warps the\nuser to Minea. Some\nareas seal its power.
column3: 翅膀形状的魔法护身符。\n使用后可瞬间返回米内亚镇。\n但在强大的结界下无法使用。

column2: Ordinary iron hammer.\nFairly heavy. Could be\nused to break stone.
column3: 随处可见的铁制锤子。\n锤子本身相当重，\n用于敲碎岩石等物体。

column2: Mirror that can freeze\na single moment. Will\nbreak with overuse.
column3: 能将照出的景象暂时静止的\n镜子。因其本身耐用性有限，\n使用几次后就会坏掉。

column2: Stone mask with inset\njade. Hides enemies,\nbut reveals secrets.
column3: 镶有翡翠的石头面具。\n戴上后会看不见有生命的物体，\n但是可以看见隐藏的通道。

column2: Necklace of luminous\nblue crystal. Able to\nnullify evil traps.
column3: 用发出蓝色光辉的矿石打造的\n首饰。隐藏着强劲的破邪力量，\n可以让邪恶的机关陷阱无效化。

column2: Potion blessed by a\npriest. Gives insight\non defeated enemies.
column3: 伟大的传道师调配出来的\n药水。交战经验的累积，\n而得到相应的魔物情报。

column2: Paper with several\nlines of an unreadable\nlanguage written on it.
column3: 纸上写着几行看不懂的文字。
